run-scripts.label: Run
run-scripts.tooltip: Run all the selected scripts in sequential order from bottom to top.

script-log-tooltip: This script log has been cleaned for ease of use. Some entries may have been filtered out unintentionally.
Entries are listed from latest to oldest (top to bottom). Running multiple scripts at once will run them in reverse order.
To view the complete log or previous runs, check the OpenSpace/logs folder.
